headline: Is Gen Digital (GEN) One of the Best Dirt Cheap Stocks to Buy?
summary: Gen Digital Inc. (NASDAQ:GEN) is one of the 11 Dirt Cheap Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On October 3, Jefferies reiterated its Hold rating on Gen Digital Inc. (NASDAQ:GEN) with a price target of $31. Jefferies highlighted some risks in the short term, especially related to Gen Digital Inc.’s (NASDAQ:GEN) expansion into financial wellness […]
